/**
 @page DAC_Dual16_DAC_2CH_Convert

 @verbatim
 * @file    DAC_Dual16/DAC_2CH_Convert/readme.txt
 * @version V1.00
 * @date    2018-12-11
 * @brief   Description of DAC.
 @endverbatim

@par Example Description:

This example describes how to use HT32 DAC. DAC's R-channel output 1.65v, and DAC's L-channel output 1.10v.

@par Directory Contents:

- DAC_Dual16/DAC_2CH_Convert/main.c               Main program
- DAC_Dual16/DAC_2CH_Convert/ht32fxxxx_it.c       Interrupt handlers

@par Hardware and Software Environment:

- This example can be run on HT32 Series development board.
- Please observe the DAC's voltage change through the oscilloscope.
